articles.title: Study suggests first people reached North America via ‘sea ice highway’ around 24,000 years ago - WION
articles.description: Study suggests first people reached North America via ‘sea ice highway’ around 24,000 years ago
articles.content: How and when did humans get to North America? It is arguably one of the most hotly debated topics in archaeology. There have been many theories and studies over the years, and a recent study suggests… [+3042 chars]

articles.content: Former US President Donald Trump has once again used inflammatory and divisive language to attack immigrants and his political opponents. Speaking at a rally in Durham, New Hampshire, on Saturday, he… [+2453 chars]

articles.title: Boston Tea Party turns 250 years old with reenactments of the revolutionary protest - The Associated Press
articles.description: Patriotic mobs and harbor tea-dumping are returning to Boston on Saturday as the city marks the 250th anniversary of the revolutionary protest that preceded America’s independence. Saturday's commemoration of the Boston Tea Party included scheduled reenactmen…
articles.content:
